name: Lash Salon
description:
Hey Makeup artist! Now you have your own amazing lash studio for making perfect eye lashes and eye art!
Time to give some eye lashes a makeover - Remove, clean, brush and make a total eye art masterpiece!
In your amazing lash studio you can give your clients the ultimate lash salon spa experience, just like DIY Makeup and many other makeup artist games.
So what are you waiting for? You have a line out the door of your Lash spa salon, clients are waiting for some super Lashes and eye art makeover!
